parameters.subject: =🎨 Tu pedido {{ $json.body.order_id }} ha sido recibido: imágenes guardadas correctamente
=[ILUSTRA] Pedido {{$json.body.order_id}} guardado · {{ $json.body.name }}
parameters.message:
=

Nuevo pedido recibido y guardado

Cliente

  • Nombre: {{$json.body.name}}
  • Email: {{$json.body.email}}
  • WhatsApp: {{$json.body.whatsapp}}

Pedido

  • Order ID: {{$json.body.order_id}}
  • Folder Name: {{$json.folderName}}
  • Folder ID: {{$node["Create folder"].json["id"]}}
  • Carpeta Drive: abrir
  • Origen: {{$json.body.source_url}}
  • TS: {{$json.body.ts}}
  • UA: {{$json.body.userAgent}}

Imagen subida

  • Nombre: {{ $node["Upload file"].json.name || $json.photoFilename }}
  • WebView: ver
  • MIME: {{ $node["Upload file"].json.mimeType || $json.photoMime }}
  • Tamaño: {{ $node["Upload file"].json.size }} bytes
  • Dimensiones: {{ $node["Upload file"].json.imageMediaMetadata?.width || $json.imageMediaMetadata?.width }}× {{ $node["Upload file"].json.imageMediaMetadata?.height || $json.imageMediaMetadata?.height }} px
  • Checksums: md5={{$json.md5Checksum}} · sha1={{$json.sha1Checksum}} · sha256={{$json.sha256Checksum}}

Condiciones & consentimiento

  • termsAccepted: {{$json.body.termsAccepted}}
  • portfolioConsent: {{$json.body.portfolioConsent}}

Precio

  • Base: {{$json.body.pricing_base}} €
  • Total: {{$json.body.pricing_total}} €
  • Extras (raw): {{$json.body.pricing_extras}}
Gracias, {{$json.body.name}}. Hemos recibido tu pedido {{$json.body.order_id}}. Carpeta: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/{{$node["Create folder"].json["id"]}} Imagen: {{$node["Upload file"].json["webViewLink"]}} Archivo: {{ $node["Upload file"].json.name || $json.photoFilename }} Tamaño: {{ $node["Upload file"].json.size }} bytes Resolución: {{ $node["Upload file"].json.imageMediaMetadata?.width || $json.imageMediaMetadata?.width }}x{{ $node["Upload file"].json.imageMediaMetadata?.height || $json.imageMediaMetadata?.height }} px Precio total: {{ $json.body.pricing_total }} €
